Life College of Learning – Bay view Learning Centre Application 2025, How to register online for Life College of Learning – Bay view Learning Centre 2025,  Life College of Learning – Bay view Learning Centre courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year have been released by the management of the Life College of Learning – Bay View Learning Centre.

Life College of Learning – Bay View Learning Centre online application ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to Life College of Learning – Bay View Learning Centre
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for Life College of Learning – Bay View Learning Centre Application 2025

For Life College of Learning – Bay View Learning Centre Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport
